description:
Accident And Injury Attorneys Serving East Providence

At d'Oliveira & Associates we are fully committed to helping you obtain the money you need after suffering a preventable injury or loss. Our attorneys and staff will fight for your rights and be by your side throughout the leagal process. Whether from a motor vehicle accident, defective product, slip-and-fall accident, dog bite or any other similar claim of negligence, you can trust our attorneys to fight hard on your behalf to recover the maximum amount possible for your pain and suffering.

Social Security Disability And Workers' Compensation Claims

Likewise, employees who were hurt or contracted an illness on the job can rely on us for effective assistance and support acquiring their rightful Social Security Disability and workers' compensation benefits.

Experience, Convenience, Results

Originally established in 1989 by experienced attorney Paul d'Oliveira, our law firm now has 15 office locations throughout Rhode Island and Massachusetts offering a level of convenience unmatched by other legal practices. Having secured over $200 million in settlements and awards on behalf of our clients, we have also earned a reputation as a law firm that gets results.

Discuss Your Needs Free Of Charge

For the quality, effective counsel you need to get the compensation and benefits you deserve, look no further than d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. Our law firm offers free initial consultations and a no-fee guarantee, so you can discuss your situation with one of our dedicated attorneys with no risk and no obligation.
